extendedInfo.description: For personnal use:You like to record all your expense and train a budget.You have to remind and share accounts in several currenciesFor simple business:You have to deal with some bank reconciliation.You have to schedule payment, due-date.It is useful to have the possibility to publish receipt for managing allowances.For distributed agencies:You own several business unit and you have to prepare, schedule and communicate financial decisions.For accounting certification:You have to share your accounting information with your shareholders, or  team.For business who don't need accounting but managerial finances... and many other use that could emerge from business cases.FlowZR Budget and Finance management software is easy to use. With few minutes a week you can store and track all your financial movements. FlowZR perfectly seeks your accounts, you cash before and after it goes into banking or accounting.Envelopes budgeting is considered as a best practice both for personal and business usage. FlowZR exclusive feature allow management of budget envelopes but that get historiated.FlowZR finance software for mobile is also available  with last generation of design.FlowZR provides real-time Profit and Loss Report and a VAT due register. FlowZR operate by value date and billing date (accrual or cash accounting).FlowZR allow attachment of scanned documents (invoices, BL, etc., ...) to centralize all your documentation and make it always available even from mobile. It is a perfect Entreprise Content Management solution for accounting documentation. Document storage size is cheap, virtually unlimited, and always backed up.Account reconciliation, cash management, treasury forecast are made by a simple drag and drop. You can test different scenarios of deadlines for your payments. FlowZR keeps a historical changes that you can go back on error (undo-redo). FlowZR allow secure sharing of accounts.  It is very useful for your shareholders, or if you are treasurer of an association or trustee or handle some cash for others.FlowZR claims to be one of the most secure software in its class.Using Google Account authentication you can expect best securities from them as a major player in the game of mailers.Using your password at Google Mail is more secure because users you give access will never share this password and will take all counter measures in case of password loss.Using Google SSL certificate is much more secure than maintaining a company one.Google Cloud is more reliable than any company using hosted solutions can offers.Using online tools is more secure than storing your data on a Windows operating system or Android devices  dues to virus and worms issue.FlowZR do not send or sell any of data you provided FlowZR gets a strong privacy policy. Direct Raise sarl based in Kingdom of Morocco provide a non disclosure agreement as your trustee does.FlowZR is ideal before accounting for financial and archive documents for those who have no accounting. If you have a clear view of your finances so you can concentrate more on your business.In all cases:Account receivable, account payable.Anticipate a profit and loss report (consolidated or not, accrual or cash).Send to your bookkeeper quickly so he can do it's job.Track expenses by category, assets tracking, assets management.Store and backup accounting documents on the Google Cloud.Easily retrieve docs securely stored  by account, transaction or accrual date. Similar and better than Quicken, Mint, Clearcheckbook, Yendo, Easymoney, YouNeedABudget, Mveloppes, or Simple Budget Try and compare on Alternative.to and use our feedback platform at flowzr.uservoice.com

reviews.title: Finansisto with cloud sync
reviews.comment: Nice, but sometimes has trouble syncing
reviews.author: Dmytro Suvorov

reviews.title: Just Excellent!!!
reviews.comment: Te best app for personal finances!!! Just, could you make it prettier? Holo maybe ?

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: I have used Financisto for more than 1 year, and I always wait for the synchronization feature. Now I have this app.
reviews.author: Anh Quan Nguyen

reviews.title: good but crash quite freqently
reviews.comment: good because it is exactly like Financisto, but crashed quite frequently on my phone especially during cloud sync...
reviews.author: Miaosi Chen

reviews.title: Search
reviews.comment: I was under the impression that with this last update we were able to seach. I can\'t seem to find this function.
reviews.author: Marta Rosa

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I love this app. I use it all the time. The only reason I give it three stars is because I\'ve seen other apps that have a website as well that syncs with the app. It would be the best program if it\'s kind if it did that as well
reviews.author: Alicia Jacobs

reviews.title: powerful
reviews.comment: This is that financisto\'s apps need it
reviews.author: Miguel Guillen Paz

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Exactly like Financisto, and with cloud sync. The best free money app
reviews.author: Paul Yarl

reviews.title: This is a great app.
reviews.comment: I love the way you can update online and enter transactions offline on the phone/tablet then synchronise via the cloud and get it all together. AND the programmer emails you asking what features you\'d like to see! How cool is that. :-)
reviews.author: Serge Nicaudie
